data.author: Lee Chong Ming
data.title: Claude Code's creator explains the limits of vibe coding
data.description: The engineer behind Claude Code says vibe coding works for prototypes, but today's AI models still fall short for maintainable software.
data.content:
The creator of Claude Code, Boris Cherny, says AI still struggles with maintainable code.Illustration by Thomas Fuller/SOPA Images/LightRocket via Getty Images

data.title: Bitcoin drops below $86,000 while sinking toward year’s lows
data.description: Bitcoin dropped below $86,000 for the first time in two weeks with investor sentiment weakening as the largest cryptocurrency slips deeper into bear market territory.
